#text=Going grocery shopping is a routine task for most people .
#text=As most groceries nearby now require the use of reusable tote bags rather than offering paper or plastic bags , the trip usually begins at home with remembering to take along a tote or two .
#text=I begin my trip by starting down the aisle to either the far right or left and continuing from there .
#text=If the store offers an ad at the door I will usually pick one up and decide if there are any deals I wish to take advantage of .
#text=Keeping an eye on my spending is importnat , as grocery expenses can add up quickly .
#text=If I am doing major shopping I will use a cart , but if I 'm just stopping for a few items , a hand basket will suffice .
#text=When paying for my items I do my best to find the shortest line with the fastest checker so I can be in and out as quickly as possible .
